mean_cn: n. 围困；围城；说服；长期努力；长期折磨；不断袭击
mean_en: a situation in which soldiers or police officers surround a city, building, etc., in order to try to take control of it
short_phrase: a castle impossible to lay siege to
sentence: The only way to capture this castle is by siege.
sentence_trans: 夺下城堡的唯一方式就是包围它。
